extensionDescription.message: Copy a page's URL with a hash at the end that identifies the location on the page

aboutOrHelp.description: label for the About/Help link in the options

menuButtonLabel.description: label for the context menu button

noNearbyElementError.message: No element near this one has an ID or name
noNearbyElementError.description: error message for when there is no nearby element with an ID or name

elementBlacklistDescription.message: Space-separated list of elements to ignore when looking for an id.

elementWhitelistDescription.message: Space-separated list of elements to use when looking for an id. Set to empty string (nothing) to disable whitelist.

maximumLocationDifferenceLabel.description: title of the "maximum location difference" option

maximumLocationDifferenceDescription.message: Maximum vertical location difference (in pixels) between the right-clicked element and the nearest parent with an id. Set to -1 to disable.
maximumLocationDifferenceDescription.description: description of the "maximum location difference" option

maximumLocationDifferenceUnit.description: unit for the "maximum location difference" option (pixels)

save.description: label for the save button in the options

errorRestoringOptions.description: error message shown when there is an error restoring the options

errorSavingOptions.description: error message shown when there is an error saving the options
